body.name: Fanny Pack for Women Men, Capolo Mini Belt Bag Crossbody Waist Bags with Adjustable Strap Fashion Waist Pack Waterproof for Travel Workout Running Cycling Hiking, Camo Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 11 mins
features: 【FASHIONABLE BUM BAG】Are you looking for a classic and versatile mini belt bag that never goes out of style? Capolo waist pack is an ideal product that combines fashion, convenience, and performance. The perfect stylish appearance is designed for women, men, and teenagers, and easy to match various styles of outfits to increase your fashion cool style. Great for yourself or as a perfect gift!

【LARGE CAPACITY】 The cute black fanny pack has 1 main pocket and 2 front zipper pockets. The main zip pocket has 3 mesh wall pockets to stay organized! and is spacious enough for any model of your phone, cash, keys, headphones, cards, sunglasses, or other small items. Come with a FREE RFID-blocking cardholder to keep your credit card safe from blocking unauthorized scans.

【PREMIUM MATERIALS】Our everywhere belt bags are made of smooth and durable polyester, they are water-resistant, lightweight, wear-resistant, easy to clean, and unfaded. Paired with smooth and stylish golden solid zippers, adds fashion elements, most important it is sturdy, durable, easy to slide, and works smoothly.

【ADJUSTABLE BELT】Fit waist from 30.25" to 48.25", easily adjusted to any comfortable length without loosening. Different from the thin straps on the market, we widen and thicken the straps which will be smooth, softer, and more comfortable. It can be worn in a variety of ways- wear it in front of your waist, on your hips, across your chest, or over your shoulders.

【MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS】Can be used as a hiking fanny pack, running bag, hip bag, bum bag, shoulder bag, chest bag, waist bag, coin purse or kids fanny pack. Perfect for cycling, running, fishing, climbing, jogging, walking, hiking, travel, shopping, and fitness. Perfect for various occasions, meet your various needs at one time!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Capolo Belt Bag? Are you looking for a classic and versatile mini belt bag that never goes out of style? Capolo waist pack is an ideal product that combines fashion, convenience, and performance. The perfect stylish appearance is designed for women, men, and teenagers, and easy to match various styles of outfits to increase your fashion cool style. Great for yourself or as a perfect gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and practical!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for vacation and it’s the perfect size, I was able to keep all of my important things and my phone handy. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and pockets inside and out!
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and quality of this little bag. Got one for my 7 year old first which she adores and doesn't leave home without it. Perfect size for an iPhone, lip gloss or chapstick, money or whatever and super cute too! I liked it so much had to get one for me too! Definitely recommend this. Only thing I don't love is I have to extend the strap all the way to fit my chest but still works for me and my kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this specifically to take on our disney trip but it has become my everyday purse since coming home, because I love it so much. Wore as a fanny pack at Disney. Wear shoulder cross belt style (like the cool kids haha) for everyday use. Good quality material. Compact enough, you don't feel like you're wearing a full size bag but big enough you can carry all your essentials. Phone, sunglasses, cardholder wallet, chapstick, Lotion, mints, etc.Strap and buckle are heavy duty, bag material looks easy to wipe clean, zippers are solid quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bag looks decent for a fanny pack, and is not too bulky. I was looking for something small, just for my phone and keys, and this is the smallest I've found, though ideally I'd like something smaller. It has a padded back, which gives it some shape and makes it more comfortable. The main downside is that the strap is too short to wear comfortably as a cross-body sling (and I'm short), so I can only wear it around my waist or hips. For the price, it's worth keeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy that fanny packs have come back! I considered them too dorky the first time around, but now I am in 100%. I live in a walking city and use this pack for quick jaunts and errands - basically whenever I don't need a full purse full of everything plus the kitchen sink. I can easily fit my phone, wallet, keys, sunglasses, and hand sanitizer, which are my basics. I also like that you can wear it a bunch of different ways, and it looks cute to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t really care for the gold hardware & was a little smaller than expected, it measures right I just didn’t realize it would make that big of a difference from my Pander bags. Other than that, it’s pretty & will use in the winter under my outerware. Well made too. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect going out bag- not too big or too small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and so functional
reviews.reviewText: Something about this cute little bag just upgrades my outfits. I love it and I can fit so much in it!!
